statements: SELECT * FROM LegalContracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM LegalContracts ORDER BY contract_timestamp DESC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_owner FROM LegalContracts WHERE contract_owner = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM LegalContracts WHERE contract_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT contract_name, contract_content FROM LegalContracts ORDER BY contract_name ASC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_owner FROM LegalContracts;
SELECT * FROM LegalContracts WHERE contract_owner = 'Alice';
SELECT contract_name FROM LegalContracts WHERE contract_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT contract_id, contract_owner FROM LegalContracts ORDER BY contract_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT contract_owner FROM LegalContracts;
SELECT * FROM legal_contracts;
SELECT contract_text, blockchain_hash FROM legal_contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_text, blockchain_hash FROM legal_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT contract_id, verification_status FROM verification_records WHERE verification_status = true;
SELECT contract_id, timestamp FROM verification_records ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM legal_contracts WHERE contract_id = 10;
SELECT contract_text FROM legal_contracts WHERE LENGTH(contract_text) > 100;
SELECT count(*) AS total_contracts FROM legal_contracts;
SELECT * FROM verification_records WHERE verification_status = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT contract_id, blockchain_hash FROM legal_contracts WHERE contract_id > 5 ORDER BY contract_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Contracts;
SELECT contract_name, created_at FROM Contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT party_name, signature_hash FROM Signatures WHERE signed_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT verifier_name FROM Verifications WHERE is_verified = TRUE;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, verified_at FROM Contracts LEFT JOIN Verifications ON Contracts.contract_id = Verifications.contract_id;
SELECT * FROM Contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT contract_name, created_at FROM Contracts WHERE blockchain_id = 2 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_content, contract_hash FROM Contracts WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT Contracts.contract_id, Contracts.contract_name, Signatures.party_name, Signatures.signed_at FROM Contracts INNER JOIN Signatures ON Contracts.contract_id = Signatures.contract_id;
SELECT contract_id, verifier_name, is_verified, verified_at FROM Verifications WHERE verifier_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY verified_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM parties WHERE party_name = 'Alice';
SELECT contract_name, contract_text FROM contracts WHERE blockchain_hash = 'xyz123';
SELECT * FROM signatures WHERE signed_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT party_name, public_key FROM parties WHERE party_name LIKE 'B%';
SELECT contract_id, verified FROM verification WHERE verifier_name = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM contracts;
SELECT contract_name, contract_text FROM contracts ORDER BY contract_name ASC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_text, blockchain_hash FROM contracts WHERE contract_name LIKE '%agreement%' ORDER BY contract_name DESC;
SELECT c.contract_name, p.party_name, s.signed_date FROM contracts c JOIN signatures s ON c.contract_id = s.contract_id JOIN parties p ON s.party_id = p.party_id;
SELECT v.contract_id, v.verified_date, v.verified, v.remarks, p.party_name FROM verification v JOIN parties p ON v.verifier_name = p.party_name WHERE v.verified = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Contracts;
SELECT contract_name, creator_id FROM Contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_hash FROM Contracts ORDER BY creator_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Contracts WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT contract_name, contract_text FROM Contracts WHERE creator_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, creator_id, creation_date FROM Contracts WHERE creator_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT * FROM Contracts WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT contract_name, creator_id, contract_text FROM Contracts ORDER BY creator_id ASC, contract_name DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_text FROM Contracts WHERE creator_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-210987654321';
SELECT contract_id, contract_hash, creator_id FROM Contracts WHERE contract_hash LIKE '%abc%';
